attributes.action: Scrap the Zero Emission Vehicle (ZEV) mandate
attributes.additional_details: So that many jobs in the future in the UK will not be lost when UK car manufacturers and factory’s can no longer operate profitably due to the EV mandate imposed on them.
attributes.background: I want the government to scrap the ZEV so that Uk manufacturers can continue making petrol and diesel cars and vans according to their own will based off supply and demand from customers

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Abolish the deadline for the purchase of new petrol and diesel cars
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/704957
